menu.name: Menu'Fitness'
menu.text: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to food preparation: more fresh fruit and vegetables. A product for active and healthy people. It is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.name: Menu 'Lenten '
menu.text: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: total absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein through tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.name: 'Menu'Premium
menu.text: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. </br> Red fish, seafood, fruit - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
